content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. How much are you considering to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, but I think the price is a bit high for my budget. I'm a student, so I'm looking for something more affordable. Would you be willing to lower the price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking for the best deal for my property. However, I'm willing to negotiate a bit if you can convince me that you're a reliable tenant. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: My budget is €600 per month. I believe this is a fair price for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center, especially since it is unfurnished.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but €600 is much lower than my asking price. The location and amenities of this apartment are very attractive, and I've received inquiries from other potential tenants who are willing to pay more. However, I'm willing to listen to your case if you can convince me that you're a long-term tenant who will maintain the property well.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I can assure you that I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I will take good care of the apartment and pay the rent on time every month. I am a student at the university, and I have a part-time job to cover my living expenses. I plan to rent the apartment for at least 2 years.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your commitment to maintaining the property and being a long-term tenant is certainly appealing. However, the price is still below my expectations. How about we meet in the middle? I can offer you the apartment for €700 per month, which is a fair compromise considering the market value and the benefits of the location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, but I believe €650 per month would be a more reasonable price for me. I am willing to pay a little more than my budget, but I cannot afford €700. I will take very good care of the apartment and be a reliable tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to pay more, but €650 is still below my asking price. Let's see if we can find a solution that works for both of us. How about this: if you agree to pay €675 per month, I'll include all utilities in the price, and you won't have to worry about additional bills. This is a special offer just for you, considering your situation as a student. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, and I appreciate your understanding of my situation. I accept your offer of €675 per month, including all utilities. I agree to the price of €675 Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Yi-Nuo. We have a deal at €675 per month, including all utilities. You will find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. I'm sure you'll enjoy your time here. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
